title: Dyson DC50 upright vacuum cleaner: 2 Tier cyclone technology- Official Dyson video
description: DC50 Animal vacuum cleaner is our smallest upright cleaner; weighing just 11.6 pounds. With new 2 Tier Radial™ cyclones, the technology inside has not simply been shrunk, but concentrated. Every angle and dimension re-engineered by a team of over 70 Dyson engineers.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
DC50 Animal vacuum cleaner is our smallest upright cleaner; weighing just 11.6 pounds. With new 2 Tier Radial™ cyclones, the technology inside has not simply been shrunk, but concentrated. Every angle and dimension re-engineered by a team of over 70 Dyson engineers.


http://www.dyson.com/vacuums/uprights/dc50/dc50-animal.aspx
http://www.youtube.com/DysonUS
https://twitter.com/Dyson
https://www.facebook.com/dyson

transcripts: Can a vacuum cleaner this small and light perform like a big heavy one. Let's see. Nylon brushes for carpets, soft anti-static carbon fibers for hard floors. All in a self adjusting cleaner head. Ball technology to turn on a dime and Dyson's two-tier radial cyclones to capture more microscopic dust. Talk about concentrated technology.
